text: [Ej mu'minon] Be tardid sumo dar [mavridi ʙazli] amvolu conhojaton ozmois mesaved va [hamcunin] az kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙa onon kitoʙi [osmoni] doda sudaast [jahudijon va masehijon] va [niz] az kasone, ki sirk varzidand, suxanoni ozordihandai ʙisjore xohed sunid; va [ammo] agar saʙr kuned va taqvo pesa sozed, [soistatar ast; zero] in [istodagi] ʙajongari azmi ustuvor [-i sumo] dar korhost
